extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for managing Bluetooth connections.

    1.1
    Author:
    Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake

      • requestEnableDiscoverable

        public static void requestEnableDiscoverable(Activity context,
                             int time,
                             ResultAction act)
        request a user input to enable Bluetooth discoverable mode.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        time - number of seconds to be discoverable
        act - callback to be executed afterwards.

      • onActivityResult

        public static boolean onActivityResult(Activity context,
                       int reqCode,
                       int resultCode,
                       Intent data)
        Receiver for fetching callbacks. Should be called in Activities onActivityResult in the beginning.
        Parameters:
        context - current activity context
        reqCode - the results request code
        resultCode - the result code
        data - additional received data
        Returns:
        true if the received activity result was handled by this class.
